subject: Re: [junit] Re: bad class file error with KitchenSink app
msgSnippet: Will I took a crack at this about 6 months ago. In the end I found Java 1.5too deeply embedded in JUnit 4.4 to make it work. It took me 2 days just unwind the
messageBody:
Will I took a crack at this about 6 months ago. In the end I found
Java 1.5too deeply embedded in JUnit
4.4 to make it work. It took me 2 days just unwind the syntax errors and
after another couple of days didn't have a running example.

Good Luck and let me know if you had better luck than I in pulling it off.

Cheers
Mark
